title.rendered: Four Seasons Marks Highly Anticipated Return to Shanghai with New Luxury Hotel in City Centre

content.rendered:
Combining Shanghai’s historic charm and urban flair, the new Four Seasons Hotel will offer a distinct luxury hospitality experience with modern design, dynamic culinary concepts and resort-style amenities throughout

TORONTO, Dec. 21, 2023  /PRNewswire/ — Four Seasons together with Fungseng Prosperity Holdings Limited have announced plans for a new hotel in Shanghai, marking a new chapter of growth for the luxury hospitality company in one of China’s most important cities.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/four-seasons-marks-highly-anticipated-return-to-shanghai-with-new-luxury-hotel-in-city-centre-302020545.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
